inclusion.criterion: laparoscopic bariatric surgery in a patient older than 18 years of age without previous laparotomy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Examples of laparoscopic bariatric procedures are gastric band, sleeve gastrectomy, gastric bypass, gastric bypass after lap band, and revision of a gastric bypass
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Allergies or contraindications to the use of one or more of the following drugs: propofol, rocuronium, sugammadex, remifentanyl, or sevoflurane
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of sleep apnea and PCO, which may be relevant for the surgery. However, she is considering a laparoscopic gastric bypass.
